document.full_text: the operator of the crippled fukushima daiichi nuclear plant said it is studying whether the facility's reactors were damaged in the march 11 earthquake even before the massive tsunami that followed cut off power and sent the reactors into crisis.
document.title: tokyo electric: reviewing records of how nuclear crisis unfolded
lines_and_colors: the operator of the crippled fukushima daiichi nuclear plant said it is studying whether the facility's reactors were damaged in the march 11 earthquake even before the massive tsunami that followed cut off power and sent the reactors into crisis.
